credit_line: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 20 x 19 cm (7 7/8 x 7 1/2 in.)
title: Sample
description: Twill weave in brown and copper metallic yarn. Warp is brown two-ply and brown textured yarns that alternate. Weft is light brown three-ply yarn that alternates with flat metallic copper paired with wrapped metallic gold. Selvage at right.
